title: Journalists will accept that their critics are sometimes right
description: I sincerely hope this is the year journalists will stop being surprised and offended by the negative feelings people have about our work. That posture is short-sighted and not useful. The wide world of journalism (never mind “the media”) includes so many goals, styles, audience segments, and ethical frameworks. Journalism is practiced through a huge...
